column5: Relax or party in luxury in large house. Private pool in backyard that can be heated to Jacuzzi temperature but is still long enough to swim laps. Gated community 1 mile from department, groceries, and drugstore. Inside 1604 and 5 miles from the Rim, La Cantera, Six Flags Fiesta TX, and other restaurant/nightlife options.  Listing booked? Check out my listings for the other bedroom or for a set of 3 bedrooms: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17994251 and https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/18492772
